# Links and Images

## Links

Simple link: [GitHub](https://github.com)

Link with title: [GitHub](https://github.com "GitHub Homepage")

Reference link: [GitHub][gh]

Another reference: [Example][1]

Autolink: <https://github.com>

## Images

Simple image: ![Alt text](image.png)

Image with title: ![Alt text](image.png "Image Title")

Reference image: ![Alt text][img]

[gh]: https://github.com
[1]: https://example.com
[img]: image.png
